channel.title: SDP on Dynamic Simulation Environment
channel.description: Recent content in SDP on Dynamic Simulation Environment

item.title: SDP - Simulation Development Platform
item.description: Synopsis Simulation Development Platform (SDP) using Codespaces or DevContainers to code, build, and run DSE Simulations. Setup Codespace Dev Container Usage VS Code Terminal GitHub Workflows DSL Keywords AST

item.title: Graph - Graph Tools
item.description: Synopsis Graph Tools for static and dynamic analysis of Simulations. $ graph import example/graph/sim $ graph report Commands The Graph tool includes the following commands and options: Drop Option All (-all) Export Import Report Option Tag (-tag) Container The Graph Tool is also packaged as a Container and may be used outside of the SDP.
